attributes.action: Offer student finance eligibility for the Hong Kong BNO visa holders in the UK
attributes.additional_details: So many people have fallen into debt from the cost of paying for our visa as well as starting anew in the UK. Some financial relief in the form of student finance for higher education would be greatly appreciated for many families with children who plan to study in the UK.
attributes.background: The government should allow HK BNO visa holders that are students pursuing higher education in the UK to apply for student finance as it would be a great financial relief.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581679
